text: Digaula gu de hagalongo gi ana haganoho, gu hagalee haga kila aga ana hagababa ala ne hai ang gi nadau maadua mmaadua, ge gu de hagalongo gi ana helekai bolo gi hudee heia nadau haihai huaidu. Digaula gu daumaha hua gi nia balu god, guu bida hai ginaadou gii hai nia balu daangada. Digaula guu kae hua nia hangahaihai o nia daangada ala i golo, ala e noho i nadau baahi, gu de hagalongo gi nnelekai o Dimaadua dela bolo gi hudee kawe go ginaadou.
